Module description of gridengine/source/dist
     

    This module contains files and directories which are part of a Grid Engine distribution. During installation the files and directories of the 'source/dist' module are copied to the $SGE_ROOT directory (in case of a local installation) or to the distribution repository. See the file 'source/README.BUILD' for more information about the Grid Engine build process.
     
     
    README.arch description how the script 'util/arch' works
    ckpt/ README files and CKPT interface scripts for various kernel level checkpointing interfaces
    dist.html this file
    doc/ currently empty, content is copied from 'gridengine/doc'
    examples/ sample demo job scripts
    inst_sge Grid Engine installation script for qmaster and execd
    install_execd wrapper to 'inst_sge' to install execution host
    install_qmaster wrapper to 'inst_sge' to install qmaster host
    mpi/ README files and MPI interface scripts to run parallel jobs under Grid Engine
    pvm/ README files and PVM interface scripts to run parallel jobs under Grid Engine
    qmon/ Qmon pixmaps, help file  and X11 resource file
    util/ scripts and files needed during installation. Also contains subdirecories with sample queue calendar files and load sensor scripts
